ygData.subject: little *spoiler  *
ygData.msgSnippet: Heum i already get the boot and the belt. But for the cloak, chanda don t want to sell to anyone. So When you talk about some faction, i think the only way to
ygData.messageBody:
Heum i already get the boot and the belt. But for the cloak, chanda don't
want to sell to anyone. So When you talk about some faction, i think the
only way to get the cloak is to help his family in karana (by killing
scarecrow?). Any idea for this "quest" ?
A very very good cape for wizzard is the cap from everfrost. You can see
there an npc with a pet named iceberg (a polar bear). This npc sell a cape
for 5 platinium if you can provide her with a polar bear pelt. This cape is
great cause everyone can wear it and it s 5 ac 20 protection vs cold.


yakos

level 12 wizzard

> From: "McGraw, T. David" <Mcgraw.Thomas@...>
>
> Surefall is located in Qeynos Hills, just follow the road straight out of
> Qeynos and you will usually see Chanda by the fire near the entrance.
>
> Yours,
>
> ~Aereuss Ravins of Tarew Marr
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Shadowwalker [mailto:Shadowwalker@...]
> Sent: Monday, April 19, 1999 11:11 AM
> To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
> Subject: [eq_wizards] Re: Tons of Information
> *spoiler*
>
> From: "Shadowwalker" <Shadowwalker@...>
>
> Where is Surefall glade?
>
> -Shadowwalker of Karana
>
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: <williamb@...>
> To: <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
> Sent: Sunday, April 18, 1999 7:00 PM
> Subject: [eq_wizards] Tons of Information *spoiler*
>
>
> > From: williamb@...
> >
> > Hail and well met adventurers, this is Eantos of the
> Crafter of New Vision
> Guild. As I have seen numerous post I will be covering a few
> topics in this
> E-mail. First, up the topic of armor.
> > I personaly know of a Quest with Baobob and Chanda Miller
> infront of
> Surefall glade. To get the great items made by these NPCs
> all one has to do
> is raise you faction with them a little bit (kill bandits in
> Karana plains,
> or gnolls in Splitpaw). Then target them and say phrases as
> "what belt?",
> "what boots", and "what cloak". They'll be sure to tell you
> the rest. The
> armor they made is wearable by everyone, and is the same AC
> as chainmail
> armor. Truely a wizards best friend. The seond topic I would
> like to address
> is weapons.
> > Personaly I have a great lust for two-handed weapons, and
> just recently
> last night I found the secret to acquiring one of the most
> powerfull
> two-handed staffs I have seen around. The name of the staff
> is the "Runed
> Totem Staff". This staff usualy has a street price of 35 to
> 55 plat. To
> acquire this staff, you must travel to Splitpaw dungeon (in
> South Karana).
> After you arrive at Splitpaw you must get together a tough
> group of level
> 12s and higher, then travel down into the depths of the
> dungeon and find a
> NPC named "Shaman Ren Rex". He puts up a good fight but
> gives out a staff
> every 10th time he spawns or so. Also I have timed his
> spawning to
> approximately 17 minutes. So, run around, kill him and come
> back in 17
> minutes for him later....Well thats all that time I have
> right now. I'll be
> back with some more information soon....
> >
> >
> > -Eantos
> >
> > By the way, stats on Runed Totem Staff, +5 mana, +5
> hitpoints, damage of
> 9, delay of 37. (better than Great staff that sells in
> stores for 25 plat)
> >
> >
